detectors.description:
Matthew.fallback() () sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- isSuccess = whale.send(stake - nextStake) ()
	- isOtherSuccess = msg.sender.send(stake) ()
detectors.markdown:
[Matthew.fallback()]() sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [isSuccess = whale.send(stake - nextStake)]()
	- [isOtherSuccess = msg.sender.send(stake)]()

detectors.description: Matthew.fallback() () allows anyone to destruct the contract
detectors.markdown: [Matthew.fallback()]() allows anyone to destruct the contract

detectors.description:
Matthew.setNewPeriod(uint256) () should emit an event for: 
	- newPeriod = _newPeriod ()

Matthew.fallback() () compares to a boolean constant:
	-isSuccess == false ()

detectors.description: Parameter Matthew.setNewPeriod(uint256)._newPeriod () is not in mixedCase
Variable Matthew.WINNERTAX_PRECENT () is not in mixedCase
Variable Matthew.DELTA () is not in mixedCase

Reentrancy in Matthew.fallback() ():
	External calls:
	- isOtherSuccess = msg.sender.send(stake) ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- setFacts() ()
		- blockheight = block.number ()
	- setFacts() ()
		- period = newPeriod ()
	- setFacts() ()
		- stake = this.balance ()
	- setFacts() ()
		- whale = msg.sender ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- StakeIncreased(stake increased,whale,stake,blockheight) ()
detectors.markdown:

		- [period = newPeriod]()
	- [setFacts()]()

	- [setFacts()]()
